definition[0]: the change a popular performer makes from working in one area of entertainment to another
example[0]: J Lo has made a crossover from music to the movies.
definition[1]: the fact of liking, using, or supporting different types of things or groups

definition[2]: a car that has some of the features of a normal car and some of the features of an SUV or 4x4
